summary: Teenager Midori's family moves back to the city where she lived as a child and is relieved to discover that her old friend Ryusuke still lives there. Her terrifying nightmares begin ... See full summary »
cast: Kumiko Akiyoshi|Mao Asami|Lisa Gotô|Shuntaro Hani|Hirotarô Honda|Yuki Inomata|Miki Itô|Yôsuke Kawamura|Kazusa Matsuda|Ryûhei Matsuda|Asumi Miwa|Hitomi Miwa|Yôichirô Saitô|Yôsuke Saitô|Takahashi Shinji
title: Shibito no koiwazurai
